name: Ralph-TUI Test Feature
description: Test PRD for manually testing Ralph-TUI end-to-end workflow

userStories.title: Create test file A
userStories.description: Create a simple test file named 'output-a.txt' containing 'Task A completed'
acceptanceCriteria: File output-a.txt exists in the test-workspace directory
File contains the text 'Task A completed'

userStories.title: Create test file B
userStories.description: Create a simple test file named 'output-b.txt' containing 'Task B completed'
acceptanceCriteria: File output-b.txt exists in the test-workspace directory
File contains the text 'Task B completed'

userStories.title: Create test file C
userStories.description: Create a simple test file named 'output-c.txt' containing 'Task C completed'
acceptanceCriteria: File output-c.txt exists in the test-workspace directory
File contains the text 'Task C completed'

userStories.title: Merge outputs A and B
userStories.description: Create merged-ab.txt that combines content from output-a.txt and output-b.txt
acceptanceCriteria: File contains content from both output-a.txt and output-b.txt

userStories.title: Create final summary
userStories.description: Create summary.txt that lists all completed tasks and their outputs
acceptanceCriteria: File confirms merged-ab.txt and output-c.txt exist

metadata.purpose: Manual end-to-end testing of Ralph-TUI workflow
